Package utils

Class GeneticAlgorithmUtil

java.lang.Object
utils.GeneticAlgorithmUtil
public class GeneticAlgorithmUtil
extends java.lang.Object
This class will contain useful utility methods for the genetic algorithm class.

    • mutate

      public static NeuralNetwork<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> mutate​(NeuralNetwork<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> nn, float percent, float magnitude)
      This method will mutate or change the weights of the nodes of a Neural Network based on the percent of nodes of a networks and the magnitude or the amount to change the individual nodes by.
      Parameters:
      nn - This parameter will be the neural network whose nodes will be mutated.
      percent - This parameter will be the percent of nodes to mutate.
      magnitude - This parameter will be the amount the nodes weights may change by.
      Returns:
      NeuralNetwork

    • crossover

      public static NeuralNetwork<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> crossover​(NeuralNetwork<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> nn1, NeuralNetwork<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> nn2)
      This method will create a child neural network from two neural networks by randomly selecting nodes from both parents.
      Parameters:
      nn1 - This parameter is the first neural network parent.
      nn2 - This parameter is the second neural network parent.

      NeuralNetwork
